headline: SoundHound Rival Cerence AI Scores Nvidia Automotive Pact. Shares Surge.
summary: Cerence AI, a rival of SoundHound, announced an automotive pact with Nvidia. Cerence stock popped, SoundHound stock also gained.

headline: Cerence AI Expands Collaboration with NVIDIA to Advance its CaLLM Family of Language Models

headline: Cerence AI Signs Long-Term, Strategic Partnership to Build Luxury Automaker’s Next-Gen In-Car Experience
summary: BURLINGTON, Mass., Jan. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Cerence Inc. (NASDAQ: CRNC) (“Cerence AI”), a global industry leader in AI for transportation, today announced a multi-year agreement with JLR to develop the luxury automotive’s next-generation in-car experience. The companies will partner to leverage Cerence’s AI-enabled technologies to deliver advanced intelligence and capabilities to JLR customers globally.
